Recovery 
                
The long-term effects of CCHF infection have not been studied well enough in survivors to determine whether or not specific complications exist. However, recovery is slow.",CDC,Crimean-Congo Hemorrhagic Fever (CCHF)
How to prevent Crimean-Congo Hemorrhagic Fever (CCHF) ?,"Agricultural workers and others working with animals should use insect repellent on exposed skin and clothing. Insect repellants containing DEET (N, N-diethyl-m-toluamide) are th
